channel.title: CVE Feed for node.js -- unzipper
channel.description: The latest CVEs for node.js -- unzipper

item.title: CVE-2018-1002203|2024-08-05T12:47:57.463Z -- node.js -- unzipper
item.description: unzipper npm library before 0.8.13 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowing attackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in a Zip archive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability is also known as 'Zip-Slip'.
